name: Moxies Marvelous Melon Adventure
description:
Welcome to Moxie`s Marvelous Melon Adventure ...

Maneuver Moxie the Melon via the A & D or the arrow keys through the endless staircase of the Melon Dimension. Moxie really does not like Pumpkins! Smash those Pumpkins! Also avoid DANGER CUBES or Moxie will loose an eye!

This game was made in 6 hours for the February 2017 Berlin Mini Jam / Melon Game Jame

....

Please feel free to give some feedback in the comments ( especially if something does not work )

best
